DocumentUri.description: A tagging type for string properties that are actually document URIs.

integer.description: Defines an integer in the range of -2^31 to 2^31 - 1.

uinteger.description: Defines an unsigned integer in the range of 0 to 2^31 - 1.

description:
A simple text document. Not to be implemented. The document keeps the content
as string.

languageId.description: The identifier of the language associated with this document.

lineCount.description: The number of lines in this document.

uri.description:
The associated URI for this document. Most documents have the __file__-scheme, indicating that they
represent files on disk. However, some documents may have other schemes indicating that they are not
available on disk.

version.description:
The version number of this document (it will increase after each
change, including undo/redo).
